Name: atd
Overview: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']NOT FOR PUBLIC USE YET...[/span][/u][/b][br][br]Automated Tidal Downloader :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client

Both: Enable Automatic Script Start.Name: Both: Enable Automatic Script Start
Both: Enable Automatic Script Start.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Both: Script Interval.Name: Both: Script Interval
Both: Script Interval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Both: Musicbrainz Mirror URL.Name: Both: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
Both: Musicbrainz Mirror URL.Description: OPTIONAL :: Only change if using a different mirror

Both: Musicbrainz Rate Limit.Name: Both: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
Both: Musicbrainz Rate Limit.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10 :: Set to 101 to disable limit

Both: Lidarr Url.Name: Both: Lidarr Url
Both: Lidarr Url.Description: REQUIRED: Lidarr URL, Lidarr provides artist list for processing with ATD...

Both: Lidarr API Key.Name: Both: Lidarr API Key
Both: Lidarr API Key.Description: REQUIRED: Lidarr API Key, enables ATD to connect to Lidarr...

Both: Script Mode.Name: Both: Script Mode
Both: Script Mode.Description: REQUIRED: set to: music or video or both :: both downloads music and videos, the others set the download to the desired media type

Both: CountryCode.Name: Both: CountryCode
Both: CountryCode.Description: Set to Tidal Region, same region as your account

Music: Compilations.Name: Music: Compilations
Music: Compilations.Description: false = disabled; true = enabled :: Enabling this downloads compilations the Artist Appears On...

Music: WantedQuality.Name: Music: WantedQuality
Music: WantedQuality.Description: FLAC or 320 or 128 :: Maxium Quality :: FLAC (CD quality 16bit), 320 (320 kbps AAC), 128 (128 kbps AAC)

Music: RequireQuality.Name: Music: RequireQuality
Music: RequireQuality.Description: false = disabled; true = enabled :: Enabling requires the downloads to match the expected file type (.flac or .m4a)...

Music: Replaygain Tagging.Name: Music: Replaygain Tagging
Music: Replaygain Tagging.Description: true = enabled :: Scans and analyzes files to add replaygain tags to song metadata
